title: Christmas Hextech Boxes...Riot, Don't you want my money!?
body:
So, Riot recently announced new Hextech Crafting boxes similar to the PROJECT Hextech boxes i hope, however i thought they were gonna be released on patch 6.24 but so far ive been checking the Hextech loot in the store and dont see the new Hextech boxes.

Please Update.

replies.body: I dont know, maybe because IT ISNT SNOWDOWN YET
